documentation.text: @param roerouter Address of Roe whitelist router

documentation.text:
@notice Send dust to treasury
 @param asset The token to transfer

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address) view external returns (struct DataTypes.ReserveData memory)

params.amounts: The amount of the flash-borrowed asset
params.assets: The address of the flash-borrowed asset
params.initiator: The address of the flashloan initiator
params.params: The byte-encoded params passed when initiating the flashloan
params.premiums: The fee of the flash-borrowed asset

returns.result: True if the execution of the operation succeeds, false otherwise
